snippet: Here on the 6th floor, we don't talk (much) about what led us to accumulate MacArthur Awards or "zillions" of YouTube parodies. But we do have our own inspirational moments that led to career switches, broken engagements, even escapes from New York....
abstract: Here on the 6th floor, we don't talk (much) about what led us to accumulate MacArthur Awards or "zillions" of YouTube parodies. But we do have our own inspirational moments that led to career switches, broken engagements, even escapes from New York. Below, a sampling of such turning points.

headline.main: Our Own Modest Tales of Inspiration
